item.description: You are invited to the dance party every Sunday evening at the Elegant Nathniel Silsbee House Mansion in Salem, Mass. The doors open at 7:30 To 11:30 PM for an evening of dance, adventure, and romance. Possibly meet up with that special one. A four thousand Square foot hall is available to our group of 300+ dancers and there is plenty of seating. Smart casual attire and dress jeans OK. Dancers may bring your favorite dance music CD's and we will play your great dance tunes through out the evening. Parking is available in the rear of the building and around the Salem Common. Partner and line dance lessons will be posted on the weekly schedule, also intro to many different dance styles. Lesson starts 7:30 pm sharp. Room for many and bring lots of your friends. Don't miss this great night of dance fun and mini lesson. Free Style Club Mix, West and East Coast Swing, Country Western, Partner and Line Dance, Salsa, Cha Cha and a lot more.
item.name: North Shore "Singles and Couples Dance Party" Meet Up, Salem, Mass.
